about_the_game:
【Flying snow shoots the white deer, wishing to fulfill a dream in the martial arts world.】

With the clanging of weapons and the sword in hand, we roam the world, striving to uphold justice in the ever-changing martial arts world. With cold garments and iron swords, we march thousands of miles; who in the world does not know of us?
Scholars and beauties, love and hatred, behind the flashing swords lies a hidden life of passion and affection. The ages-old saying "Emotions only leave regrets" holds true, as one pities those who turn grey before growing old.
Astounding events, stirring emotions, startling dreams, and heart-wrenching moments—only after all these shocking experiences do we understand that this journey through storms is called "roaming the martial arts world."

【Game Features】

Open-world and plot settings with freedom to roam the martial arts world.


Relaxed gameplay mode with idle-style growth enjoyment.


High character engagement, with full NPC recruitment and sparring.


Diverse companion combinations with highly flexible development and growth.


Many exciting features to be unlocked in future updates.
